NAME: Country
DESC: Generates a random country name, with the option to limit the subset to those countries entered via the interface.
explanation: This controls what country names will be generated by this field.
countryPluginsDesc: Country plugins provide a richer data set for generating more realistic results. With this option selected you can map other fields like Region, City, Postal/Zip and Phone to this row, ensuring that each final row has a random region within the randomly selected country, a random city within the region - and so on.
filterDesc: This makes the field only generate a subset of the countries selected above.
